comments: Duren (DET) is firming up over his right foot in Ball's (CHA) path and does not deliver illegal contact as he sets the pick.
Ball (CHA) extends his left arm into Hayes' (DET) path and initiates contact with Hayes' front/right arm. This contact occurs prior to any initiated by Hayes thereafter.
Duren (DET) is firming up over his right foot in Martin's (CHA) path and does not deliver illegal contact as he sets the pick.
Richards (CHA) establishes himself in Bogdanovic's (DET) path and is leaning forward slightly as he braces for the impending contact, which Richards does not deliver.
Bogdanovic (DET) brings his left arm, sliding it off Ball's (CHA) left arm/side as Ball changes direction during his dribble.
Stewart (DET) makes clean contact with the ball and deflects it away from Miller (CHA) during the pass.
Duren (DET) and Miller (CHA) jump toward one another and incidental body contact occurs when they come together in the air as Duren retrieves the loose ball.
Duren's (DET) left foot does not step out of bounds after he gains control of the loose ball.
Duren (DET) establishes himself in Martin's (CHA) path and does not deliver illegal contact as he sets the pick.
Richards (CHA) is turning alongside Bogdanovic's (DET) path and marginal contact occurs with Bogdanovic's left side and arm after his gather.
Duren (DET) brings his right hand toward Martin (CHA), and marginal contact occurs as they each attempt to establish a rebounding position.
Martin (CHA) brings his left arm forward and marginal contact occurs with Duren's (DET) front and right arm as Duren attempts the put-back.
Duren (DET) extends forward and initiates body contact with Ball's (CHA) right side, affecting his driving shot attempt.
Richards (CHA) and Thompson (DET) each make clean contact with the ball as simultaneous incidental arm contact occurs during the rebound.

Burks (DET) contests Richards' (CHA) put-back attempt and marginal contact occurs with Richards' right arm after the release. Thompson (DET) raises his right arm up and simultaneous marginal contact occurs with Richards' left arm during the put-back attempt.
Ball (CHA) is moving forward prior to marginal body contact occurring with Burks' (DET) back following the change of possession.
Ball (CHA) is moving forward slightly when marginal body contact occurs with Hayes (DET) near the sideline.
Washington (CHA) brushes Duren's (DET) left arm, and Duren can move through the marginal contact to finish at the rim.
Washington (CHA) establishes himself in Thompson's (DET) path and does not deliver illegal contact as he sets the pick on the wing.
Burks (DET) and Ball (CHA) come together at the same spot and incidental body contact occurs after Ball loses control of the ball on his own during the drive.

call_type: Turnover: Lost Ball Out of Bounds
comments: Replay review of the out of bounds call pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed successful. Ball's (CHA) right leg touches the ball last before it goes out of bounds. Possession was awarded to Detroit.
Prior to Detroit calling timeout and advancing the ball into the frontcourt, Burks (DET) and Washington (CHA) engage and disengage with one another, and marginal contact occurs during the inbound.
During the proceeding inbound, Bogdanovic (DET) and Ball (CHA) engage and disengage with one another, and marginal contact occurs.
Washington (CHA) commits a take foul on Bogdanovic (DET).
Ball (CHA) flails his off-arm outward and initiates contact with Thompson's (DET) head/neck area during the driving shot attempt.
Miller (CHA) commits a take foul on Burks (DET). The transition take foul rule does not apply to the last two minutes of either the fourth quarter or overtime.
Stewart (DET) legally contests Bridges' (CHA) jump shot attempt.
Ball (CHA) commits a take foul on Hayes (DET). The transition take foul rule does not apply to the last two minutes of either the fourth quarter or overtime.
Hayes (DET) legally contests Bridges' (CHA) jump shot attempt.

call_type: Turnover: Lost Ball Out of Bounds
comments: Bridges (CHA) touches the ball last before it goes out of bounds.
